title: Defence Ministry hotline to inform on mobs/violent groups
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Defence Ministry requested the general public to inform details of criminal activities such as unlawful mobs/violent groups and incidents of damaging public/private property, looting and assault from any part of the island to the following numbers.
Cabinet composition still not decided, GotaGoGama should continue – Prime Minister
